name: A Crow Named Basil
description:
Crow game - Build 10/31/2022 (pre-alpha) 

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump (Hold to Glide)

M - Open map

Q - Open Questlog

E - Open Inventory

F - Craft

T - Interact

R - Place rock

left click - Confirm place rock

right click - Put away rock placer

Debug:

Z - Add a dummy quest (questbook needs to be reopened for it to show) - note this quest CANNOT be completed!
